about_the_game:
Features

Grab yourself a drink and a bite to eat and sit back while watching your team decimate the hordes of evil!
A Semi-Idle RPG with a focus on class customization and build variety.
Thousands of build options at your disposal to take on the challenges you will face!

All with ZERO MTX!!!!

  • Features 60+ different classes, 500+ different skills, unlimited amount of build options to help make the team of 4 heroes you control defeat over 300 monsters, bosses, and ultra bosses!

  • Fun and fast combat with unique challenges and strategies.

  • Increased speed can be unlocked up to 20x!

Character & Class Customization

  • A very in-depth interface that allows you to see every facet of battle, stats, and more to help you decide how to make your team even stronger!

  • All classes have unique character art and their own skills, strengths, and weaknesses.

  • Leveling up offers stat points that you can use to build a character ANY way you'd like!

  • Passive skills that can vastly change abilities and playstyles!

Pets & Achievements

  • You can choose from 1 of 4 pets to help bolster your team and you control when it uses it's special attack. It's base stats also enhance the party!

  • 100+ Achievements. Each Achievement you earn, raises the level of your pets.

  • Pet level is global. If you start a new game, it will inherit that level for a Prestige effect!

  • Pet skill can be used manually. It can also be improved by Passive skills on characters!

Leveling & Progression

  • Level cap of 500+!

  • Every new tier of character power (Level 100, 200, 300, etc...) must be unlocked by completing challenging maps with Ultra Bosses!

  • Rigorously tested to offer the best balance of progression we could find!

Crafting & Alchemy & Equipment

  • Craft with 16 different ingredients in 4 different crafting slots for a 4 x 4 x 4 x 4 = 256 different crafting combinations PER piece of equipment.

  • 4 different equipment slots!

  • Unique equipment has special stats not found in crafting equipment for even more possibilities!

  • The Level cap of equipment is equal to the Level cap for you characters!

  • An alchemy craft that allows you to use potions on your allies and enemies manually! This craft can be improved with a characters skills and gear.

ZERO MTX! We play games, but not with your wallet! We ain't shady like that. One-time buy and complete everything in the game.
